metadata.description: SERIES PREMIERE The sold-out indie hit returns through IMAGE COMICS! SUN BAKERY comics anthology features the following stories: "DREAM SKILLS," about a city where guns are obsolete and the social culture is swordplay; "AREM," a space adventurer on a quest to photograph the most beautiful galactic vistas; and "BAT RIDER," a supernatural skateboarding comic.
metadata.name: Sun Bakery
